value.title: Robots are learning workplace etiquette at MIT
value.excerpt: While humans learn workplace etiquette on the job, it's of course, a much different value proposition for robots. The machines cannot develop these skills by simply asking questions and understanding commands like the AI in Siri or Alexa, according to researchers at MIT's Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory (CSAIL).

value.title: DeepMind’s new AI can beat humans at 57 Atari games
value.excerpt: Google subsidiary DeepMind has unveiled an AI called Agent57 that can beat the average human at 57 classic Atari games. value.title: Alphabet’s DeepMind AI is better than you at Atari games
